<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Countless Eyes](/Spells.aspx?ID=680)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 217 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Eyes form across the touched creature's body, allowing it to see in all directions at once. The subject can't be flanked for the spell's duration. In addition, when the subject Seeks, it can [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) in a 30-foot burst centered on itself or up to four 15-foot bursts within line of sight.
name: Countless Eyes
